thread.title: How to Make Sweet Potato Toast [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
thread.title_full: How to Make Sweet Potato Toast [Vegan, Gluten-Free]

author: Nathalie Sader
title: How to Make Sweet Potato Toast [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
text: February 27, 2017 LIKE OGP ON FACEBOOK : Plain toast has gone out of style. First, it was avocado toast. Then, toppings started to get adventurous. There's nothing like creative toast for breakfast, especially with the delicious and colorful toppings that captivate all your senses and make you so indecisive about which one you are going to go for. How about we ditch the bread for a change and we try these delicious and nutritious sweet potato toasts instead? It's so easy to make! Sweet potato is sliced lengthwise and then toasted or cooked in a skillet until slightly crisp on both sides. Top with avocado like a classic avocado toast or go wild and come up with your own dazzling topping! How to Make Sweet Potato Toast [Vegan, Gluten-Free] This Recipe is :
